Malta: The 'Consiglio Popolare' is mentioned when King Alphonsus of Aragon mortgaged the islands to Antonio Cardona.
France: The Burgundians compelled Charles VI to sign the Treaty of Troyes, under which the throne was to pass to Henry V.
China: Construction of the Forbidden City and Beijing city fortifications was completed. The Yongle Emperor moved the Ming capital from Nanjing to Beijing.
